original: unfold is_linear. intros. split. - intros x y. rewrite <- linear_plus. unfold opp. rewrite <- 2!linear_opp. apply linear_plus. - intros k x. unfold opp. rewrite <- linear_scal. apply linear_opp. - destruct (linear_norm opp) as [M [H1 H2]]. exists M. split. + apply H1. + intros x. rewrite <- linear_norm. apply H2.
